data.text:
Carol Ann Jackson, 69, of Cochranville, passed away on Tuesday, February 22, 2022 at the Chester County Hospital in West Chester, PA. She was the wife of the late Raymond W. "Catty" Jackson who died in 2012. Born in Coatesville, she was the daughter of the late Charles M. Dero and Bertha D. Petro Dero.

Carol was an area resident all her life and a 1970 graduate of the Coatesville Area High School. She was employed for 25 years, by the Brandywine Hospital as a scheduling coordinator.

She enjoyed listening to music, trips to the ocean and mountains but most of all, she enjoyed spending time with her granddaughter.

She is survived by two sons; Robbin N. Lammey, Jr. and wife Amanda of Huntingdon, PA and Herbert V. Lammey and fianc√© Margaret Wagner of Cochranville and one granddaughter Olivia Ann Lammey.

Memorial services will be held on Saturday, March 5, 2022 at 12:00 noon at the Wilde Funeral Home, 434 Main St. Parkesburg, PA with visitation from 10:00 AM to the time of the service.

In order to protect those at risk, please wear a face mask and practice social distancing while at the funeral home.

In lieu of flowers, memorial donations can be made in her memory to the PA Breast Cancer Coalition, 2397 Quentin Rd., Suite B, Lebanon, PA 17042 www.pabreastcancer.org or the Brandywine River Valley Hospice, 121 Bell Tower Lane, Oxford, PA 19363.
